content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

None

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Before attempting to craft an item, ensure that all required ingredients are available in sufficient quantities. The error message indicates a failure to craft `iron-gear-wheel` due to a lack of `iron-plate`. Wait until enough iron plates are smelted before attempting to craft iron gear wheels. The agent repeatedly attempts to craft `iron-gear-wheel` without sufficient `iron-plate`, indicating a need to check resource availability more proactively.

## NAMESPACE

None
